title: Weeding Photography
description: Looking for a wedding photographer? We approach weddings in a documentary and artistic way, trying to tell the story of your day honestly and unobtrusively. Our images are warm, romantic, and intimate. We hope to give you images that make you feel, not just see.!

facility.name: Dream Weaver Photography
facility.details: It clearly and beautifully captures your emotions- the joy, the laughter, the tears, you name it. Our pride is in offering the best shoots as we help you tell your story in photos.

title: Birthday Photography
description: Birthdays are a great time for photographs – especially the major milestones! You’ve no doubt put it a lot of hard work organising, styling and catering for your special event. Whether it is a 1st or 21st birthday, don’t leave capturing the special moments to chance! We will preserve your memories in a classy and stylish manner, without breaking your budget.

title: Couple Packages
description: our portrait session will be a reflection of your relationship. You NEED photos of the two of you besides the ones at your wedding or prom - but intentional photographs of the sweet moments in between.When you peek at the back of my camera to see how stunning you look after learning how to pose naturally, you’ll feel like magazine models!

title: Model Photography
description: If you are new to Modelling and want Agency ready images or simply want to update your Portfolio we have the package to fit your needs.extensive experience in the Fashion and Modelling industry gives him an edge over other “general” photographers. You pay nothing for the photoshoot, you only pay for the images you wish to buy. There is no obligation to buy any but we are confident you will want more than a couple. Planning your Modelling shoot can be daunting but we are here to help you along the way with Styling suggestions, Posing and even Hair and Makeup Stylists.We usually recommend items from your own wardrobe however we are happy to go shopping with you or provide garments from our own sources. Naturally you bear the cost of purchase or hire of these.

title: Student Package
description: Print as many photos as you want, upload to facebook, email images to family and friends.You will own the copyright to all 4 images.A great value and ecological alternative to paper prints.SINGLE PHOTOGRAPHER Including CD High res. images.
